dcterms:creator: O. Bernard
A. Lalande
C. Zotti
F. Cervenansky
dcterms:description: Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge (ACDC) is a cardiac MRI segmentation dataset containing 150 patient records for training and 50 for testing. The dataset includes 2D slice images extracted and cropped to 160x160, with a total of 1841 training slices and 1076 testing slices. The slices are normalized to the range (0-1) and are used for MRI reconstruction tasks.
dcterms:title: Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge (ACDC)
